# TypeScript Performance (Deprecated)

This file is deprecated. Canonical TypeScript and performance guidance lives in `performance-first.instructions.md`.

If you landed here, please read `performance-first.instructions.md` for the authoritative rules and checks:

- `skipLibCheck`, incremental builds, and `import type` usage
- Bun typechecker for dev (`bun --typecheck`)
- `bun run analyze:type-perf` and `bun run type-audit` for CI checks

Keep this file only to ease discovery during transition; it will be removed after teams confirm migration.
